Summary: On my way to work at Lake Lure, NC- White-Grey Object-Disc appeared and disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsI know it was UFO-ET issue- Im working in re-mote area- They have not bothered me in 6 months. Its like these beings track and hunt me just waiting for another chance. I was taken back in Sept-2006- who knows what intentions-maybe none-hopefully. I always file a report just in case anything happens. I have been working in that area since Monday-April-15-2013
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ellenboro
This sighting has never been favorited.
